pg:template_data.edit:template: <!-- ROOT ELEMENT --> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="/pg:page"> <xsl:if test="/pg:page/@file_type = 'php'"> <xsl:call-template name="php_header" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="document('call:doctype/html/5')" disable-output-escaping="yes"/> <html> <xsl:call-template name="xhtml_head"/> <xsl:call-template name="xhtml_body"/> </html> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="/pg:redirect"> <xsl:call-template name="pg:redirect"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="/pg:css"> <xsl:call-template name="pg:css"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template>

<!-- PAGE REDIRECT for Index-Page --> <xsl:template name="pg:redirect"> <xsl:variable name="id_index" select="document('get:navigation')/proj:pages_struct/pg:page/@db:id"/> <html> <head> <meta name="robots" content="index, follow"/> <meta name="generator"><xsl:attribute name="content"><xsl:value-of select="document('call:getversion')" /></xsl:attribute></meta> <meta name="description"><xsl:attribute name="content"><xsl:value-of select="document(concat('get:page/', $id_index))//pg:meta/pg:desc"/></xsl:attribute></meta> <meta name="keywords" content=""/> <meta http-equiv="Refresh"> <xsl:attribute name="content">0 ;URL=<xsl:value-of select="document(concat('pageref:/', $id_index, '/', document('get:languages')/proj:languages/proj:language/@shortname))/."/></xsl:attribute> </meta>
<title> <xsl:value-of select="document(concat('get:page/', $id_index))//pg:meta/pg:title/@value"/> </title> </head> <body/> </html> </xsl:template>

<xsl:template name="xhtml_head"> <head> <!--meta http-equiv="Content-Type"> <xsl:attribute name="content"><xsl:value-of select="$content_type"/>; charset=<xsl:value-of select="$content_encoding"/></xsl:attribute> </meta--> <xsl:if test="not($tt_lang = 'int')"> <meta name="Content-Language"><xsl:attribute name="content"><xsl:value-of select="$tt_lang"/></xsl:attribute></meta> </xsl:if> <meta name="author" content="Frank Hellenkamp"/> <meta name="generator"> <xsl:attribute name="content"><xsl:value-of select="document('call:getversion')" /></xsl:attribute> </meta> <meta name="keywords" content="Content Management, Content Management System, CMS, contentmanagement, content, management, Redaktionssystem, Redaktionssysteme, web, publishing, usability, accessibility, Webdesign, Design, Interface Design, PHP, Mysql, Apache, Flash, Open Source, opensource, barrierefrei, Barrierefreiheit, BITV"/> <meta name="description"><xsl:attribute name="content"><xsl:choose><xsl:when test="$tt_multilang = 'true'"><xsl:value-of select="//pg:meta/pg:desc[@lang = $tt_lang]"/></xsl:when><xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="//pg:meta/pg:desc"/></xsl:otherwise></xsl:choose></xsl:attribute></meta> <meta name="verify-v1" content="pg1mgjsvVR675fLAmtxZjeT8wJz1eMibW+2/WgGgOAQ=" />
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/css/global.css')/."/></xsl:attribute></link> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document(concat('libref:/global/css/color_',$tt_actual_colorscheme,'.css'))/."/></xsl:attribute></link> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/css/screen.css')/."/></xsl:attribute></link> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="print"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/css/print.css')/."/></xsl:attribute></link> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="handheld"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/css/handheld.css')/."/></xsl:attribute></link>
<script type="text/javascript"><xsl:attribute name="src"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/js/jquery-1.3.1.min.js')/."/></xsl:attribute></script> <script type="text/javascript"><xsl:attribute name="src"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/js/global.js')/."/></xsl:attribute></script> <script type="text/javascript"><xsl:attribute name="src"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/js/chili/jquery.chili-2.2.js')/."/></xsl:attribute></script> <script type="text/javascript"><xsl:attribute name="src"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/js/chili/recipes.js')/."/></xsl:attribute></script>
<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><!--[if lt IE 8]></xsl:text> <script src="http://ie7-js.googlecode.com/svn/version/2.0(beta3)/IE8.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><![endif]--></xsl:text>
<link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/favicon.ico')/."/></xsl:attribute></link> <link rel="icon" type="image/png"><xsl:attribute name="href"><xsl:value-of select="document('libref:/global/favicon.png')/."/></xsl:attribute></link>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow"/>
<xsl:variable name="title">depage . <xsl:value-of select="/pg:page/@name" /><xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$tt_multilang = 'true' and //pg:meta/pg:title[@lang = $tt_lang]/@value != '' ">: <xsl:value-of select="//pg:meta/pg:title[@lang = $tt_lang]/@value"/></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$tt_multilang = 'true' and //pg:meta/pg:linkdesc[@lang = $tt_lang]/@value != '' ">: <xsl:value-of select="//pg:meta/pg:linkdesc[@lang = $tt_lang]/@value"/></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//pg:meta/pg:title/@value != '' ">: <xsl:value-of select="//pg:meta/pg:title/@value"/></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//pg:meta/pg:linkdesc/@value != '' ">: <xsl:value-of select="//pg:meta/pg:linkdesc/@value"/></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise></xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose></xsl:variable>
<title><xsl:value-of select="$title" /></title> </head> </xsl:template>

<!-- 
	CSS STYLESHEET 
-->
<xsl:template name="pg:css">html {
    background: url(../grfx/all/back_pattern.png) repeat top center <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_back" /> !important;
    background: url(../grfx/all/back_pattern.gif) repeat top center <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_back" />;
}
#contentcontainer {
    background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" />;
    border-left: 3em solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_back" />;
    border-right: 3em solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_back" />;
}
#content,
.section ul li span::before {
    background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" />;
}
.section ul li span::before {
    background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" />;
}
#content h1 {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_text_headline" />;
}
#content h1 .light,
#navigation ul a,
.topnav li a {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_text_light2" />;
}
#navigation:hover ul a {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_text_light" />;
}
#content h2,
.section time,
#content .section p.info,
#content ul,
.topnav:hover li a,
.autolinklist li::after,
ul a:hover,
#footer p,
#footer a,
#teaser .teaser em,
.cloud li,
.cloud li a {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_text_light" />;
}
.section a,
#navigation ul a:hover,
.topnav li a:hover,
.autolinklist ul a:hover,
li.highlighted a,
li.highlighted a:hover,
li.highlighted a:hover .hidden,
.cloud li a:hover {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_link" />;
}
.section a:hover {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_link_hover" />;
}
ul a,
#content ul li p,
#content .section .info {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_text" />;
}
#content .autolinklist ul a {
    color: #aaaaaa;
}
.autolinklist h3 {
    color: #999999;
}

.section .thumb .marker {
    border-top: 8em solid #151515;
}
.section .zoom .front,
.section .zoom .thumb {
        border: 1px solid #dfdfdf;
}
.section .zoom .thumb .border {
        border: 1px dotted #aaaaaa;
        background: #ffffff;
}
.section .compare div img {
	     border-left: 2px solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" />;
}
.intro {
    background: url(../grfx/all/corner_tr3.png) no-repeat top right <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_intro_bg" /> !important;
    background: url(../grfx/all/corner_tr3.gif) no-repeat top right <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_intro_bg" />;
    border-left: 3em solid #151515 !important;
    border-left: none;
}
.article {
    border-top: 1px solid #dfdfdf;
}
.autolinklist {
    border-left: 1px solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" />;
}
#content .section .caption,
#content .section .info {
        background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" />;
}
.source pre {
        background: #dddddd;
}
.source pre code li { 
        background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_intro_bg" />;
}
.source div {
        border-color: #dddddd;
}
.source textarea { 
        background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_intro_bg" />;
}

#teaser .teaser a {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_text" />;
}
#teaser .teaser a:hover {
    color: #555555;
}
#teaser .teaser:hover {
    background: url(../grfx/all/back_pattern.png) repeat top center <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_intro_bg" /> !important;
    background: url(../grfx/all/back_pattern.gif) repeat top center <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_intro_bg" />;
}
#footer {
    background: <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_back" />;
}
#navigation .nav {
    border-left: 1px solid #dfdfdf;
}
#navigation ul,
#navigation .autolinklist ul:hover,
.autolinklist h3,
.autolinklist ul {
    border-left: 0.3em solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" /> !important;
    border-left: none;
}
.autolinklist h3 {
    border-left: 0.3em solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" /> !important;
    border-left: none;
}
#navigation ul:hover {
    border-left: 0.3em solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_link" /> !important;
    border-left: none;
}
#navigation ul:hover ul {
    border-left: 0.3em solid <xsl:value-of select="$ttc_bg" /> !important;
    border-left: none;
}
	<xsl:for-each select="document('get:colors')//proj:colorscheme[@name != 'tree_name_color_global']">
/* {{{ color <xsl:value-of select="@name" /> */
#content .color<xsl:value-of select="@name" /> h1 {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="color[@name = 'text_headline']/@value" />;
}
#content .color<xsl:value-of select="@name" /> a {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="color[@name = 'link']/@value" />;
}
#content .color<xsl:value-of select="@name" /> a:hover {
    color: <xsl:value-of select="color[@name = 'link_hover']/@value" />;
}
/* }}} */
</xsl:for-each>

</xsl:template>

<!-- 
	PHP Header
-->
<xsl:template name="php_header">
	<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><?php </xsl:text>
		$tt_lang = "<xsl:value-of select="$tt_lang" />";
		@header('Content-type: <xsl:value-of select="$content_type"/>; charset=<xsl:value-of select="$content_encoding"/>');
	<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">?></xsl:text>
</xsl:template>

  • « vorheriger Eintrag previous entry
  • nchster Eintrag next entry »

<!-- Bloglist --> <xsl:template match="sec:bloglist"> <xsl:variable name="tag" select="concat('nav_tag_',edit:text_singleline/@value)" /> <xsl:for-each select="document('get:navigation')/proj:pages_struct/*[@nav_blog='true']//*[not(@nav_hidden='true')]"> <xsl:for-each select="@*"> <xsl:if test="name() = $tag and . = 'true'"> <xsl:variable name="blogid" select="../@db:id" /> <xsl:for-each select="document(concat('get:page/',$blogid))//sec:blogentry"> <xsl:apply-templates select="."> <xsl:with-param name="teaser" select="true()" /> <xsl:with-param name="blogid" select="$blogid" /> </xsl:apply-templates> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template>

<xsl:variable name="num_items">15</xsl:variable>
<xsl:template match="/"><xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><?php</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="init-feed" />
<xsl:for-each select="document('get:navigation')/proj:pages_struct//*[@nav_blog = 'true']/*"> // page <xsl:value-of select="@name" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." /> </xsl:for-each>
<xsl:call-template name="output-feed" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes">?></xsl:text></xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="pg:page_data"> <xsl:param name="url" />
<xsl:if test="count(//sec:blogentry) > 0" > <xsl:call-template name="entry"> <xsl:with-param name="title"><xsl:value-of select="//sec:blogentry/edit:text_headline[@lang = $tt_lang]//*" /></xsl:with-param>
<xsl:with-param name="text" select="//sec:blogentry/sec:text/edit:*[@lang = $tt_lang] | //sec:blogentry/edit:img | //sec:blogentry/sec:*/edit:img" /> <xsl:with-param name="link"><xsl:value-of select="$url" /></xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="date"><xsl:value-of select="translate(//pg:meta/@lastchange_UTC, '/ ', '-T')" /></xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
